name: Paradise Lust
description:
The game is a mix between a visual novel, a dating sim, and an adventure game- interspersed with a number of minigames.
You are a bartender, washed up on the shore of idyllic Tuvatuva Island along with some beautiful beauty pageant contestants and their friends. There you must learn to survive while searching for other castaways, including your brother, who was captain of the vessel.
Each character has a full backstory, which is revealed as you complete tasks and explore the island with them. The better you know them, the more effective you will be at winning their hearts, improving your relationship with them, and getting down to some naughty fun.
MEET a colorful cast of characters each with their own agendas and problems!
EXPLORE a deserted island hiding a number of secrets and surprises!
FUCK your new, attractive, lady friends. Unlock a plethora of sexy animated artworks!
